article_title: U.S. Senator Roy Blunt talks the future of healthcare in Hannibal

article_metadata.description: U.S. Sen. Roy Blunt said there's not much Congress can do to radically change or repeal the Affordable Care Act while Barack Obama still holds the presidency, but he is hopeful some “serious discussions” can take place to better health care in the future.
article_metadata.author: Eric Dundon
